page.title: 07TIDWORTH HOME LIFE
page.content: Clothing today is made of natural cotton,linen,silk and many synthetic fabrics. Easy-care fabrics that wash easily and need little or no ironing are popular. Most people tend to dress well but this is governed by their income. Clothes are bought from chain stores and individual shops. We live in a "fast-food" era and many housewives buy ready-made and frozen food which can be cooked easily. Shopping for food is done in self-service stores, the NAAFI being our biggest. Prices are quite high and it would probably cost at least Â£40 per week to feed a family of four. Homes in Tidworth have either gas or electric cookers and microwave ovens are increasingly popular. Furniture is of wood and fabric construction; plastics are widely used. Dogs and cats are popular pets.
